metadata.title: CVE-2022-40716 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise up to 1.11.8, 1.12.4, and 1.13.1 donot check for multiple SAN URI values in a CSR on the internal RPCendpoint, enabling leverage of privileged access to bypass service meshintentions. Fixed in 1.11.9, 1.12.5, and 1.13.2."

criterions.comment: consul: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
